product_name: Novara Never A Bad Time Bike T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Toss on the men's Novara Never A Bad Time Bike T-Shirt for warm-weather rides from home to the Frisbee field and all stops in-between. 100% cotton crew-neck tee is soft and breathable for comfort on warm days. Length is slightly longer for coverage on the bike; fit is not too loose or too tight. Reflective logo on left sleeve enhances visibility in low light. Novara Never A Bad Time Bike T-Shirt features a unique Novara graphic.
